name: Full Grave Panic!!!
description:
Note: It seems some people experience bugs on Webgl Version, download the windows 64 bits version if you don't want to risk it.

The graveyards are fuller than ever!!! In this game, you manage a graveyard town, carefully balancing resources between gold, limited space, and coffins. Coffins drop onto your town and you must clear them away to avoid losing health. Coffins spawns exponentially faster as the late game approaches, so be prepared.

Test your skill on hard mode:

Copper: 40 Coffins

Silver: 80 Coffins

Gold: 120 Coffins

Platinum: 200 Coffins (You are better than the creator…)

Download windows-64bits version here for better graphics + no bugs.

https://www.dropbox.com/s/f81oywylg5zzuj/Full%20Grave%20Panic%20V2.rar?dl=0
